elements.title: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 Standard Edition
elements.description: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 gives you more ways to win for the club. Team up with friends in your favourite modes with the new 5v5 Rush, and manage your club to victory as FC IQ delivers more tactical control than ever before.

elements.title: Farming Simulator 25
elements.description: Farming Simulator 25 adds rice & other crops on three maps, new animals, productions & more. 400+ machines included, with enhanced graphics & physics.

seller.name: Game Science Interactive Technology Co., Ltd.

elements.title: Black Myth: Wukong
elements.description: Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend from the past.

elements.title: God of War Ragnarök
elements.description: From Santa Monica Studio comes the sequel to the critically acclaimed God of War (2018). Embark on an epic and heartfelt journey as Kratos and Atreus struggle with holding on and letting go – now on PC.

elements.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
elements.description: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is the unforgiving FPS survival adventure in a dark science-fiction open world. Scavenge for gear and resources, hunt for wonders, make hard decisions to survive and pave the path through the Chornobyl Anomalous Zone.

elements.title: Shatterline
elements.description: Get ready for the apocalypse! Shatterline is an intense FPS with roguelike co-op PVE and PVP modes. Pick a unique operator, customize your look and weapons, and combat the alien plague!
elements.longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Get ready for the apocalypse!
<!--text-->
Welcome to Shatterline - ground zero for the apocalypse. Are you ready?

Shatterline is a fierce, intense multiplayer FPS, offering roguelike co-op PVE modes as well as competitive PvP modes. Immerse yourself in a world of explosive action; smooth, satisfying gunplay; wild customizations; and a striking landscape full of secrets, rewards, and deadly opponents.

A mysterious interstellar object has exploded near Earth, sending massive, jagged shards smashing into our planet’s surface - turning thriving cities into toxic craters and leaving millions dead. 

From this destruction, a new horror has risen: an alien contaminant called “Crystalline” that tears apart geomagnetic fields and transforms living flesh to razor-edged silica. And it’s spreading.

You enter the game as a skilled Operative, part of an elite team chosen to fight this menace. Choose from unique and powerful characters, including: a lethal sniper, armored juggernaut, experimental warfare specialist, fearless medic, and more - each has tailored gameplay, weapons expertise, and special abilities. Your mission: to eliminate the Crystalline and save what’s left of humanity. 

We are FragLab, located in Ukraine, and Shatterline has been our passion for the past five years. We are really excited to share this current release with you, our player community.

We invite you into our development process, and your feedback truly matters. Our dev team is very active in Discord; we play together and gather community feedback every day. We dive into analyzing this feedback every week, plus in-game telemetry and other data, and use that information to continue to improve the game - tinkering, tweaking, and iterating. It’s entirely possible for a wild, great idea to survive this intense community scrutiny, and focused in-house debate to land on our future development roadmap. So, tell us what you think - it matters. 

Thank you for being part of the Shatterline journey. And enjoy!

elements.title: TankHead
elements.description: Embark on a thrilling journey as Whitaker, piloting a drone-controlled tank through the desolate ECA. Battle fierce enemies, scavenge valuable parts, and fight to survive in this fast-paced sci-fi world, as you strive to reach the mysterious Highpoint.
elements.longDescription:
<!--image-->
![TankHead-1ie7g](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ce3cfe56d21147dcb398823206cf9073/tankhead-1ie7g.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
As Whitaker, your goal is to fight to reach Highpoint. To do that, you must traverse the Event Containment Area – an area where humans cannot survive. Whitaker must project his mind into a Needle, a robust drone capable of surviving in the harsh conditions of the ECA, and also of piloting your Tank. Use your Needle and Tank to combat the vehicles and creatures of the ECA to reach Highpoint.

<!--image-->
![TankHead-9t5pw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ce3cfe56d21147dcb398823206cf9073/tankhead-9t5pw.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Explore the ECA, a world torn apart by war and a mysterious cataclysmic event that left it uninhabitable by humans. Explore the Deadzone, where humans must “tele-project” their minds into drones in order to survive and pillage the remains of a once great society.

<!--image-->
![TankHead-ot5rc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ce3cfe56d21147dcb398823206cf9073/tankhead-ot5rc.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Your vehicle of choice is a Light Tank, capable of moving quickly and delivering devastating damage to your enemies and the reactive world around you. Your tank can be equipped with various weapons, armors, wheels, motors and abilities to customize your gameplay.

<!--image-->
![TankHead-97hnk](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ce3cfe56d21147dcb398823206cf9073/tankhead-97hnk.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Use a variety of weaponry to dismantle your enemies, blow off their parts, and take a clear shot at their exposed weak points to deliver decisive blows. Defeated enemies will leave behind their remaining parts for you to salvage or steal. Take what you need, scrap the rest. Use everything to survive.

elements.title: BeamNG.drive
elements.description: A dynamic soft-body physics vehicle simulator capable of doing just about anything.

elements.title: Red Dead Redemption
elements.description: Experience the story of former outlaw John Marston as he tracks down the last remaining members of the notorious Van der Linde Gang in the PC debut of the critically acclaimed predecessor to Red Dead Redemption 2.

elements.title: EA SPORTS™ Madden NFL 25
elements.description: Hit like you mean it with FieldSENSE™ powered by BOOM Tech. Experience how the new physics-informed dynamic tackling system unlocks realistic collisions & new gameplay animations on both sides of the ball.

elements.title: Legacy of Kain™ Soul Reaver 1&2 Remastered
elements.description: Experience the epic conflict of Kain and Raziel in original form or with remastered graphics.

elements.title: Dragon Age™: The Veilguard
elements.description: Rally the Veilguard and defy the gods in Dragon Age™: The Veilguard, an immersive single player RPG where you become the leader others believe in.

elements.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2
elements.description:
Mankind is in peril. The Imperium needs you. 

Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine, the greatest of the Emperor’s warriors, unleashing deadly abilities and devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid hordes.

elements.title: Star Wars Outlaws
elements.description: Star Wars Outlaws

elements.title: Planet Coaster 2
elements.description: Create a splash with Planet Coaster 2 - sequel to the world’s best coaster park simulator! Reach new heights of creativity, management, and sharing as you construct the theme parks of your dreams combining epic water rides and coasters to delight and thrill your park guests.
elements.longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Planet Coaster 2-153y4](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/2eeb60881aa8442eacf0293d5b392540/planet-coaster-2-153y4.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Create a splash with Planet Coaster 2 - sequel to the world’s best coaster park simulator! Reach new heights of creativity, management, and sharing as you construct the theme parks of your dreams combining epic water rides and coasters to delight and thrill your park guests. 

Dive in now!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# EMBRACE CREATIVITY
<!--text-->
**Expand your imagination:** 
Enhanced and improved building and pathing tools let you create spectacular, true-to-life theme parks, complete with sprawling plazas. Make your mark on the world as you shape terrain and populate your park with stunning swimming pools and thrilling rides. It’s never been easier to bring your dream park to life.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Next-level customisation: **
Embark on the coaster park experience of a lifetime as you push the boundaries of creativity like never before!  Unleash your imagination as you build the most awe-inspiring themed creations with unparalleled customisation tools! For the first time, intuitively add scalable scenery and objects to every ride to elevate your park and give your guests a day to remember.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Combine epic water and coaster rides:** 
Create the ultimate experience for your thrill-seeking guests using piece-by-piece construction. Build a vibrant array of exhilarating rollercoasters and jaw-dropping thrill rides. Design a seamlessly interconnected park paradise with glistening swimming pools and twisting water flumes.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Create unforgettable experiences: **
Surprise and amaze as you bring the dramatic flair of real-world theme parks to your guests with the brand-new event sequencer tool, while sophisticated global illumination lighting brings the theme park experience to your home with stunning visuals and striking authenticity.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# MASTER MANAGEMENT
<!--text-->
**Find the secret to success:** 
Balance thrilling your guests with managing your budget - populate your park with amazing efficiently powered attractions and the right amenities to boost your rating and become a theme park master.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Take care:** 
Provide for your guests’ health, well-being, and happiness so your park can thrive. With all-new waterparks comes the need for shade, sunscreen, lifeguards, changing rooms, and more to ensure everyone has their best day both in and out of the pool.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Satisfaction guaranteed:** 
Understanding the wants and needs of your guests has never been easier! The new ‘heat maps’ feature lets you understand the wider park’s needs at a glance before diving deeper into the details -simply select any guest to see how they and their immediate group are enjoying your theme park.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# SHARE THE RIDE
<!--text-->
**Create together:** 
Unleash your collective creativity in Sandbox Mode. Take turns to work on building a park with players around the world using a shared cross-platform save!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Play together:** 
For the first time ever, collaborate with friends in Franchise Mode to create the best theme park empire and compete with others to reach the top of worldwide leaderboards!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Visit together:** 
Soak up the fun and get up close and personal, as you experience other players theme park creations first hand - explore their worlds in first person as a park guest!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Share creations:** 
Share anything and everything! Upload coasters, rides, or even full theme parks for other players, and download and delight in other’s creations. All are easily accessible from the cross-platform Frontier Workshop both in-game and online.

elements.title: F1® 24
elements.description: Join the grid and Be One of the 20. Drive like the Greatest in EA SPORTS™ F1® 24, the official videogame of the 2024 FIA Formula One World Championship™.

elements.title: Torque Drift 2
elements.description: From the vibrant streets of Tokyo to high-stakes professional competitions backed by global brands, Torque Drift 2 invokes all aspects of drift and street culture to offer an experience as diverse and dynamic as the motorsport itself.
elements.longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Torque Drift 2-1odnr](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/94ab88ca1daf4c63b184ff6a3e21a2c6/torque-drift-2-1odnr.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Overview
<!--text-->
Torque Drift 2 is a skill-driven motorsport game set in a fictional, modern-day Japanese city. It offers extensive vehicle customization, true-to-life physics with sim rig support, licensed cars and parts, intricately detailed tracks and competitive play. With native community mod support and a number of community oriented features the game delivers immersive single-player and multiplayer experiences. Torque Drift 2 is designed to mirror real-world drift dynamics, the physics ensure an authentic feel whether you’re using a controller or a high-end sim rig. Our team, made up of developers who drift cars in real life, is dedicated to making sure the driving experience is precise and enjoyable for every player, no matter their setup.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Game World
<!--text-->
In the world of Torque Drift 2, drifting is more than a hobby—it’s a cultural phenomenon. With events and meetups integrated into the fabric of modern Japanese society, a surge of wealth has made top-tier cars and parts accessible to all. Now, both seasoned pros and fresh talent are fighting to claim their legacy as the next Drift King.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Gameplay pillars: The 5 C's
<!--text-->
- **Collect** iconic cars from well-known manufacturers and win exclusive events.
- **Customize** your ride with hundreds of real-world licensed parts to build your ultimate drift machine.
- **Create** and share custom liveries, events, and tracks to build your reputation as a modder or artist.
- **Connect** globally in multiplayer car meets and spontaneous racing sessions.
- **Compete** in various motorsport events, from timed Motorkhana challenges to intense head-to-head drift battles.

<!--image-->
![Torque Drift 2-efx7f](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/94ab88ca1daf4c63b184ff6a3e21a2c6/torque-drift-2-efx7f.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Collect
<!--text-->
**Build your way to the top!**

Collecting is central to Torque Drift 2. Purchase or earn items, then customize them to your heart's content. Earn daily ToFu currency by climbing the leaderboards, and use it to build your dream car!

**Pro Driver Cars - Legends in Drifting**

Get behind the wheel of cars from drifting legends like Mad Mike, Vaughn Gittin Jr., James Deane, Adam LZ, and many more. Drive the cars of your heroes and tune them to make them your own.

<!--image-->
![Torque Drift 2-4zewn](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/94ab88ca1daf4c63b184ff6a3e21a2c6/torque-drift-2-4zewn.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Unparalleled Customization
<!--text-->
Building on the legacy of its predecessor, Torque Drift 2 offers more customization than ever. With over 25 areas of your car to modify—from engine swaps to dash mats—and over 60 licensed brands, you’ll have endless options to fine-tune every detail and make your ride truly unique.

<!--image-->
![Torque Drift 2-1ndud](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/94ab88ca1daf4c63b184ff6a3e21a2c6/torque-drift-2-1ndud.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# User Generated Content (UGC) and Modding
<!--text-->
Modding is at the heart of Torque Drift 2's vibrant ecosystem. Through our custom mod integration and Modkit, players can create and share custom tracks using our purpose build tooling within external tools like Unreal Engine. Looking ahead, we'll introduce in-game tools that allow players to share car tunes, liveries, decals, and even host crew events and tournaments.

Our ultimate vision for Torque Drift 2 is a motorsport playground where creators are rewarded for their contributions, whether you're fine-tuning cars, designing stunning liveries, or organizing crew battles. The game is designed to showcase your skills and help you make a name for yourself in the world of TD2.

<!--image-->
![Torque Drift 2-5d1i6](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/94ab88ca1daf4c63b184ff6a3e21a2c6/torque-drift-2-5d1i6.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Competition
<!--text-->
Torque Drift 2 challenges players to push their limits with a range of competitive modes. Current competitions include freestyle events, weekly leaderboards, lead-and-chase challenges, and timed Motorkhana events. As the game grows, new features like livery contests, 1v1 drift battles, and crew tournaments will be introduced, offering even more ways to compete for parts, reputation, and global recognition.

<!--image-->
![Torque Drift 2-26o0u](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/94ab88ca1daf4c63b184ff6a3e21a2c6/torque-drift-2-26o0u.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Community and Connection
<!--text-->
Our philosophy towards Torque Drift 2 is for it to be developed around players interacting with each other in meaningful ways. So, it stands to reason that we are building a robust communication system. Built with varying levels of public and private channels, the social element of TD2 is constructed to best cater towards the players in-game needs. Whether they’re looking for a crew, trying to hire someone for work, or just want to privately message some friends, everything will be catered for in-game.

<!--image-->
![Torque Drift 2-1av9o](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/94ab88ca1daf4c63b184ff6a3e21a2c6/torque-drift-2-1av9o.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Game Modes:**

- Weekly Challenges
- Drift Battles
- Drift Skills Mode
- Freestyle Mode
- Drift Practice

**Features:**

- Full Vehicle Tuning
- Vehicle Damage
- Linear and Open-World Environments
- Multiplayer Lobbies
- Community Modding
- Vehicle Customization
- Photo Booth
- Bundle Packs
- Paint Shop

**Progression:
**

- Player Level
- Leaderboards

**Car Roster (Including Variants):
**

- Nissan 180sx, 240z, 370z, R34, R35 GT-R
- Toyota GR86, Supra (MKIV & MKV), AE86 Trueno, Chaser (JZX100)
- Mazda RX7 (FC & FD), MX5, RX3
- Ford Mustang S650 (2024)
- Subaru BRZ (2022)
- Honda Civic Type R FL5, S2000 AP1
- Pro Driver Cars from Mad Mike, Adam LZ, Team RTR, Chris Forsberg, Sammit, Odi Bakchis and more!

**Tracks:**

- Japan: Ebisu Speedway, Daikoku, Hakone
- USA: Long Beach, Irwindale, AdamLZs Compound
- & Many more integrated modded tracks

**Customizable Parts:**

- Engine Bay: Engine, Turbo, Intercooler, Intake
- Electronics: ECU
- Brakes: Caliper, Rotor
- Suspension: Coilover, Angle Kit
- Transmission: Gearbox, Clutch, Differential
- Tires: Selection of various tire compounds
- Interior: Steering Wheel, Shifter, Seats, Dash Accessories
- Exterior: Tow Strap, Wheels, Lug Nuts, Body Kits, Spoilers, Exhaust Tips

<!--image-->
![Torque Drift 2-zguv4](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/94ab88ca1daf4c63b184ff6a3e21a2c6/torque-drift-2-zguv4.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
- Highway Racing
- Crews and Tournaments
- Marketplace
- Custom license plates
- Decal/sticker editor
- Driver customisation
- Expanded Localization
- Controller mapping
- New Cars and Parts, including interior accessories like seat plushies, roll cages, air fresheners and exterior parts such as custom headlights, side mirrors, hoods and roof scoops.
- And more..

elements.title: Horizon Zero Dawn™ Remastered
elements.description: Experience the critically acclaimed Horizon Zero Dawn™ with stunning new visuals and upgraded features. In a far future where machines roam the Earth, humanity survives in unique tribes among the ruins of our long-lost civilization.

elements.title: MechWarrior 5: Clans
elements.description: In MechWarrior 5: Clans, players are new Smoke Jaguar pilots in the Clan Invasion of the Inner Sphere. Lead your five-mech "Star" across diverse planets, engaging in an expansive campaign with immersive gameplay and combat. Customize BattleMechs and explore tactical options.

elements.title: House of Golf 2
elements.description: Embark on an unforgettable golfing adventure with House of Golf 2 – not just a game, but an invitation to create lasting memories with family and friends. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a newcomer to the virtual greens, dive into a world brimming with challenges and excitement.

elements.title: Brotato
elements.description: Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds and survive until help arrives.

elements.title: Frostpunk 2
elements.description: Frostpunk 2 is the sequel to the highly acclaimed society survival game. The age of steam has passed and now, oil leads the way as humanity’s newest salvation. However, with new threats on the horizon, the future of the city looks even grimmer than before.

elements.title: Trinity Building Editor
elements.description: Home building simulator game with a goal of ultimate freedom for your creativity. Play with landscape, build the foundation, change the size of all building parts, combine pieces for a unique design, stack, rotate and scale.

elements.title: World of Goo 2
elements.description: Build bridges, grow towers, terraform terrain, and fuel flying machines in the stunning followup to the multi-award winning World of Goo. The world is beautiful, dangerous, and evolving.

elements.title: F1® Manager 2024
elements.description: Lead your team to glory in F1® Manager 2024. A new Formula 1® season has arrived, and with it, the most comprehensive F1® management experience to date. Build a legacy with one of 10 official F1® constructors or create your own team for the very first time.

elements.title: CarX Drift Racing Online
elements.description: CarX Drift Racing Online is your chance to immerse yourself in the real world of drifting. Get together with friends, tune your car and burn some tires!

elements.title: FINAL FANTASY XVI
elements.description: An epic dark fantasy where fates are decided by mighty Eikons and the Dominants who wield them. This is the tale of Clive Rosfield, a tragic warrior who swears revenge on the Dark Eikon Ifrit, a mysterious entity that brings calamity in its wake.

elements.title: EA SPORTS™ WRC
elements.description: Build the car of your dreams in our biggest rally game ever, EA SPORTS™ WRC, the all-new official videogame of the FIA World Rally Championship, the first developed by the award-winning team behind the DiRT Rally series.

elements.title: Unknown Tapes
elements.description: You are the prey. Unknown Tapes is a horror video game that employs the found footage technique to narrate a story focused on survival in a modern setting overrun by dinosaurs. It aims for realism and draws inspiration from Dino Crisis and Outlast.
elements.longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# You are the prey
<!--text-->
Unknown Tapes is a horror video game that employs the found footage technique to narrate a story focused on survival in a modern setting overrun by dinosaurs. It aims for realism and draws inspiration from Dino Crisis and Outlast.

A story will unfold, with an expected playtime of 2-3 hours from start to finish

You are being hunted by dinosaurs, and you will need to hide, avoid making too much noise, and sometimes use your wits.

Buildings can be destroyed by larger dinosaurs, so you can't always count on finding protection inside.

The game is primarily set at night, featuring both outdoor and indoor environments, some of which may feel claustrophobic.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# An Infested Urban World
<!--text-->
Thanks to photogrammetry and the graphical power of Unreal Engine 5, we’ve recreated detailed urban environments. Have you ever wondered what it would be like to walk through a town overrun by dinosaurs?

<!--image-->
![Unknown Tapes-1mrev](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/38879e542bc047d98adeda3ef778be3b/unknown-tapes-1mrev.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Real-Time Voice Detection
<!--text-->
Thanks to the use of the microphone, dinosaurs can hear your voice when you talk or shout in the real world and will react accordingly to what they perceive

<!--image-->
![Unknown Tapes-8jjfl](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/38879e542bc047d98adeda3ef778be3b/unknown-tapes-8jjfl.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Photogrammetry
<!--text-->
We used the most advanced photogrammetry software to directly bring real-world objects and environments into the game. Many of the things you see actually exist in the real world

<!--image-->
![Unknown Tapes-1k8h6](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/38879e542bc047d98adeda3ef778be3b/unknown-tapes-1k8h6.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Motion Tracking
<!--text-->
Using various software and solutions, we successfully recreated a realistic camera movement by digitizing it and integrating it into the game

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Key features
<!--text-->
- First-person narrative set in a modern world full of dinosaurs
- VHS effect
- Bodycam effect
- Blair Witch Project vibes with a tense atmosphere
- Realistic graphics using photogrammetry
- Player's voice detected through microphone

elements.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2
elements.description: Modern warfare shooter set in the Middle East. Play as Raven, Contract Sniper Assassin, as you take out a series of targets across a dramatic single-player campaign. With extreme-range shots exceeding 1000m, gear up for the most challenging entry to the series yet.

elements.title: Firelight Fantasy: Resistance
elements.description: Firelight Fantasy: Resistance is a spectacular third-person sword fighting game. Immerse yourself in the role of Hakon, a ruthless treasure hunter. Discover ancient artifacts, crush all rivals, and seize untold riches!

elements.title: LEGO® Horizon Adventures™
elements.description: Join machine hunter Aloy as she leads a colourful crew of heroes on a quest to save the world. Dive into boundless adventure, customize to your heart’s content, and take on action-packed battles solo or with friends.

elements.title: ARIDA: Backland's Awakening
elements.description: Face the drought to explore and meet the stories of the Brazilian backlands!
elements.longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Face the drought to explore and meet the stories of the Brazilian backlands!
<!--text-->
A historical single player game with elements of **adventure** and **survival**.

Explore the aridest regions, collect resources and discover clues about the destiny of the young Cícera, a girl that faces the drought to explore the 19th-century Brazilian backlands to find her parents again.

## FEATURE LIST:

### Equipped to venture out
To survive in ÁRIDA you will need some equipment. Use the machete and hoe for essential actions such as getting water, opening paths, or cutting a corn crop. But do not forget to have a handful of grindstones because blunt equipment is of no use!

### Get ready with recipes
To live in the backlands you need to be wise. The fauna and flora are unusual, so try to learn the recipes available for crafting with the typical items of the region. Maybe one day you need to cross the backlands ...

### Interact to survive
Hunger and thirst can be very cruel in the backlands during the drought. Ask for help for the elders of your village and solve their quests to get some water and food.

### Explore to know
Explore the aridest regions to learn more about the backlands and find the resources you need to stay on your way. A full inventory is always a good idea!

### Stories to learn
The Brazilian backlands is a special place, with many stories that would only happen there. Venture out to search for the collectible lost objects and find out more about the legends of the backlands.

elements.title: ATOMIC SHELTER
elements.description: In 'Atomic Shelter,' a post-apocalyptic survival game, we follow Maria Jose as she battles gangs, groups, and infected creatures in a ruined world. With core mechanics like crafting, strategy, and construction, players can customize their characters and expand their stories.

elements.title: ReMix
elements.description: A unique musical rhythm action game that combines the elements of Rogue games. In this world, you are able to choose from a variety of heroes with different fighting styles and use the power of music to battle against evil void monsters.

elements.title: Train Sim World® 5: Standard Edition
elements.description: The Rails are Yours in Train Sim World 5! Take on new challenges and new roles as you master the tracks and trains of iconic cities across 3 new routes. Immerse yourself in the ultimate rail hobby and embark on your next journey.
elements.longDescription:
The Rails are Yours in Train Sim World 5! Take on new challenges and new roles as you master the tracks and trains of iconic cities across 3 new routes. Immerse yourself in the ultimate rail hobby and embark on your next journey.

Be swept off your feet with the commuter mayhem of the WEST COAST MAIN LINE, including the Northwestern Class 350 and more.

Variety abounds on the twisting KINZIGTALBAHN with the tilting DB BR 411 ICE-T and more.

The sun-soaked tracks of the SAN BERNARDINO LINE play host to Metrolink movements, powered by the MP36 & F125.

A new way to play! CONDUCTOR MODE puts you into the role of a guard/conductor on any service. ROUTE HOPPING: fast-travel across routes to catch the action at any station. LIVE MAP: Get a real-time birds-eye view of any route, become familiar with station locations. With CREATORS CLUB, PHOTO MODE and more, embark on your own journey in your own way.

elements.title: EA SPORTS™ WRC 24
elements.description: Experience the thrill of the 2024 rally season with new locations, moments, stages, high-performance vehicles, new liveries and more. Brace yourself to embark on your continued rally journey!

elements.title: Empire of the Ants
elements.description: Conquer enemy nests and lead your colony through the perils of the forest in this groundbreaking RTS. Empire of the Ants is a photorealistic, third-person real-time strategy game where you command your insect legions in epic battles.

elements.title: Dawn of Defiance
elements.description: In this Greek myth-inspired survival craft, ascend from weak soldier to god-like anti-hero. Recruit friends or embark alone as you survive the ruined isles and build impressive Greek structures. Gather resources, arm yourself, and face down the trials of Gods on the Crossroads.

elements.title: Squirrel with a Gun
elements.description: Squirrel, meet gun. As the neighborhood’s most obnoxious rodent, develop a knack for crime and mayhem in pursuit of golden acorns in this nutty sandbox shooter and puzzle platformer. Fight tooth, claw, and gun to escape a secret underground facility and defeat the Agents.

elements.title: Supermarket Manager 2024
elements.description: Transform your modest store into a retail empire in this dynamic 3D simulator. Manage inventory, optimize pricing, and expand your supermarket. Balance supply and demand to become the ultimate Supermarket Manager in 2024!

elements.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate
elements.description: Unleash the Turtles in a rogue-like quest to rescue Splinter from the Foot Clan! Master ninja skills, unite in bodacious co-op gameplay, and conquer iconic NYC locales.

elements.title: Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions
elements.description: Your next chapter takes flight! Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Quidditch by playing solo or sharing the magic with friends and family.
elements.longDescription:
# LIVE YOUR QUIDDITCH FANTASY

Take to the sky as one of the classic positions—Chaser, Seeker, Keeper, or Beater—each with their own unique play style. Soar into legendary Quidditch arenas, as well as maps that showcase never-before-seen areas of the wizarding world.

# MULTIPLE WAYS TO PLAY

Career Mode: From backyard battles in the Weasley Burrow to high-stakes showdowns at the Quidditch World Cup, rise to become a champion either solo or in online co-op with teams of up to 3 friends. 
Exhibition Matches: set your teams, map, and difficulty and play alone or on teams of up to 3 in online co-op.
Player vs Player: Test your skills in competitive online matches against other Quidditch teams.

# YOUR QUIDDITCH YOUR WAY  

Customize Your Approach: Level up and use skill points to tailor your play style for each role. Change your flight style by switching between and leveling up different brooms.
Play As Yourself or as Iconic Harry Potter Characters: cosmetic customization options and classic character designs allow you to express your game-time personality.

elements.title: Goat Simulator: Remastered
elements.description: Goat Simulator: Remastered is the latest in goat simulation technology. Your favorite chaotic sandbox is back and more beautiful than ever, with updated graphics, every DLC, and more bugs that you can shake a goat at. WASD to rewrite history.
elements.longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Goat Simulator: Remastered is the latest in goat simulation technology.
<!--text-->
Your favorite chaotic sandbox is back and more beautiful than ever, with updated graphics, every DLC, and more bugs that you can shake a goat at. WASD to rewrite history.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Your goal? Chaos! Your muse? Pilgor the goat! If you’ve had your horns in the sand for the last 10 years, Goat Simulator is a game about causing as much destruction as you possibly can, as a goat. Headbutt, backflip and ragdoll your way around each level to earn points, and come up with creative ways to ruin an NPC's day.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Goat Simulator Remastered is the remaster no one asked for. It comes with everything you loved about the original game and more, with new and improved visuals, updated textures, shiny new lighting, and some brand-new foliage showing off the finest in advanced goat simulation technology. We've also completely reworked Mutators, allowing you to pick and choose whichever ""goat"" you desire from a handy in-game menu. You just have to catch them all first!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
The remaster also includes every DLC from the PC version, and one of our favorites from the mobile version, including:

- Goat City Bay
- Goat MMO
- Goat Z
- PAYDAY
- Waste Of Space
- (Mobile) Buck to School

There are also less exciting new things, like general optimization and bug fixing - but we promise we mainly fixed the boring ones.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Key Features:**
<!--text-->
- You can be a goat… again
- No really, that’s still the main selling point
- A brand spanking new mutator menu that lets you mix and match goats to your heart's content - if your contentment means abominations
- As buggy as you remember -  just because it's a remaster doesn’t mean we haven’t left in an unhealthy dose of physics-based bugs because why not?
- All DLCs included - we could have sold them separately to you again, but if we’re honest this is already a cash-grab
- New and improved graphics, lighting, VFX and animations - as well as revamped foliage for the prettiest leaves you’ll see in a Goat Sim game excluding Goat Simulator 3

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Disclaimer**
<!--text-->
Goat Simulator Remastered is a completely stupid game and has been a completely stupid game since we first invented goat simulation over 10 years ago. We’ve said it before, but you should absolutely be spending your money on something else, like a neat hat, a pile of bricks, or maybe pool your money together with your friends and buy a real goat.

elements.title: Highway Police Simulator
elements.description: Welcome to Caminora! Immerse yourself in the authentic police work of the American Highway Patrol. Solve cases, chase criminals and explore the open-world. Choose your officer and tackle the everyday life on the highways. Will you be able to maintain law and order?

elements.title: JudgeSim
elements.description: Things were worse than ever in Banana Republic, a somber island country. While anarchists roamed the streets, corruption was running deeper due to economic crisis and rising crime rates. Bearing these burdens were "judges" who tried to make things right with honesty...

elements.title: The Casting of Frank Stone™
elements.description: The shadow of Frank Stone looms over Cedar Hills, a town forever altered by his violent past. As a group of young friends are about to discover, Stone’s chilling past pales in comparison to what’s coming...

elements.title: Slay the Princess
elements.description: You're here to slay the Princess. Don't believe her lies.

elements.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts
elements.description: Become the ultimate assassin in the most realistic modern warfare sniping game available. Engage in an immersive single-player campaign across large, open-ended maps. Tactical thinking, stealth approach and precision in execution of long shots required.

elements.title: The Forever Winter
elements.description: The Forever Winter is a co-op tactical survival horror shooter where you and your squad must loot the dead to survive under the shadow of terrifying and gargantuan war machines locked in a never-ending conflict.
